objects.specification: A smooth flat floor surface spanning the room, rendered with a subtle earthy-toned tile texture in shades of brown, providing a durable and non-reflective base.
A vertical wall panel with smooth plaster finish in a neutral light gray, featuring a matte texture suitable for mounting educational fixtures.
A vertical wall panel with smooth plaster finish in a neutral light gray, featuring a matte texture suitable for mounting display items.
A vertical wall panel with smooth plaster finish in a neutral light gray, featuring a matte texture suitable for murals and shelves.
A vertical wall panel with smooth plaster finish in a neutral light gray, featuring a matte texture suitable for window installation and decorations.
A flat horizontal ceiling plane with a clean white plaster finish and integrated mounting points for lights, featuring a matte texture.
A larger rectangular desk with a solid wooden tabletop and robust metal frame in dark brown finish, with visible wood grain for a professional appearance.
A large rectangular blackboard with a deep matte black writing surface framed by thin wooden trim, suitable for chalk and dry-erase markers.
A decorative wall mural featuring lifelike dinosaur silhouettes and prehistoric foliage in rich greens and earthy browns, painted directly onto the wall with subtle texture.
A tall bookshelf made of dark wood with multiple shelves stocked with colorful books and assorted dinosaur models in various poses, offering decorative storage.
A large rectangular window with a slim frame and clear glass pane, allowing abundant natural light into the room.
Soft fabric curtains in an earthy green tone with a subtle pattern, hanging alongside the window and drawn to the sides.
A round wall clock with a simple frame and clear dial, featuring bold numbers and black hands set against a white face.
A potted green plant with lush foliage in a decorative ceramic pot, adding a touch of natural greenery.
A small cylindrical waste bin made of dark gray plastic with a smooth matte surface.
A small cylindrical waste bin made of dark gray plastic with a smooth matte surface.
A compact ceiling-mounted projector unit in white casing with vents and lens, designed for clear presentation projection.
